pkgmetadata.longdescription: galvani=======<!---SPDX-FileCopyrightText: 2013-2020 Christopher Kerr, Peter AttiaSPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later-->Read proprietary file formats from electrochemical test stations## Bio-Logic .mpr files ##Use the `MPRfile` class from BioLogic.py (exported in the main package)````from galvani import BioLogicimport pandas as pdmpr_file = BioLogic.MPRfile('test.mpr')df = pd.DataFrame(mpr_file.data)````## Arbin .res files ##Use the res2sqlite.py script to convert the .res file to a sqlite3 databasewith the same schema.
